sentences.english: Objective To investigate the feasibility of wrapping a lacerated kidney with pedicled omental graft.

sentences.english: In high enough quantities it can cause serious kidney problems in people.

sentences.english: The 67-year-old kidney transplant recipient has a weakened immune system.

sentences.english: ObjectiveThe degree of renal tubulointerstitial injury determines the prognosis of renal disease.

sentences.english: Objective To assess the value of ultrasound in diagnosis of congenital renal malformations.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討超聲診斷胎兒先天性腎臟畸形的價值。

sentences.english: On ultrasound, Wilms' appears as a large, heterogeneous mass of the kidney.

sentences.english: Sugars are reabsorbed in the kidney.
Probenecid improves the kidneys ability to remove uric acid from body.

sentences.english: If nephritic transplanting wins a success, hematopoiesis function can obtain apparent progress.
sentences.chinese: 腎臟移植如獲成功，造血功能可獲明顯進步。

sentences.english: Lowering high blood pressure still prevents congestive heart failure and promotes kidney health.
sentences.chinese: 降低血壓仍可防止充血性心力衰竭，促進腎臟健康。

sentences.english: This helps the kidneys retain sodium distal to the site of the mutation but at the expense of losing potassium.
sentences.chinese: 這有助於腎臟突變的遠端保鈉，但會以失鉀爲代價。

sentences.english: Cryoglobulinemia in association with hypocomplementemia usually indicates presence of renal damage.
sentences.chinese: 冷球蛋白血癥並低補體血癥常有臨牀腎臟損害。

sentences.english: Citrinin is a mycotoxin which can induce renal dysfunction, and it is tumorigenic.
